items.title: Ioane starts shock Leinster spell after Sexton spat

items.title: 'England's finest' - Root hits first century in Australia

items.title: Milestone for women's and girls' football in Wales
items.summary: More than 20,000 girls and women are now registered to play football in Wales, marking a major milestone for the Football Association of Wales.

items.title: Hearn keen on Windsor Park return for Crocker

items.title: 'Superb piece of fielding!' - Stokes run out by Inglis
items.summary: England captain Ben Stokes is run out for 19 after a mix-up with Joe Root as the tourists fall to 210-5 on day one of the second Ashes Test against Australia in Brisbane.

items.title: Can anyone stop Lampard's Coventry winning the Championship?
items.summary: Frank Lampard's Coventry City are 10 points clear at the top of the Championship and could create history - but will anything stand in their way?

items.title: First ARM-supported 3D driver for discrete gaming GPUs emerges from China â€” Lisuan 7G106 runs 3DMark on a Windows 11 ARM machine
items.summary: Lisuan's 7G105 discrete GPU was spotted running 3DMark in an ARM-based machine, revealing that Lisuan has quite possibly built the first 3D graphics driver that supports ARM machines that works with a dedicated graphics card.

items.title: 'Gifted Australia a wicket' - Vaughan baffled by Brook dismissal
items.summary: Former England captain Michael Vaughan is left dismayed as Harry Brook is caught for 31 by Steve Smith off the bowling of Mitchell Starc as England fall to 176-4 on the opening day of the second Ashes Test in Brisbane.

items.title: Realme P4x unveiled with the Dimensity 7400 Ultra SoC, a 144Hz screen, and a 7,000 mAh battery
items.summary: As promised, Realme today introduced the Realme P4x as the third member of the P Series. The Realme P4x has a 6.72" FullHD+ LCD on the front with a 144Hz refresh rate and 1,000 nits of peak brightness. The display is also advertised with a 96.9% touch accuracy when operated with wet hands. Furthermâ€¦

items.title: Bowler Wood casts doubt on fitness for third Test
items.summary: England bowler Mark Wood casts doubt on his availability for the third Ashes Test because of his knee injury.

items.title: British athletes given AI app as shield from online abuse
items.summary: British Olympic and Paralympic athletes are to be offered a new form of artificial intelligence-based protection from online abuse.

items.title: 'Excitement and nerves' for Archibald as Games loom
items.summary: Katie Archibald has already competed in a Commonwealth Games in Glasgow and is eager to do so again next summer.

items.title: Crawley falls for 76 as Australia make key breakthrough after lunch
items.summary: Zak Crawley is caught for 76 off the bowling of Michael Neser, ending a 117-run partnership with Joe Root to leave England on 122-3 on day one of the second Ashes Test in Brisbane.

items.title: Infinix Note 60 Ultra will be designed by Pininfarina, here's when it's coming
items.summary: Late last month we got word that Infinix was partnering with famous Italian design house Pininfarina for its next flagship smartphone, and today the brand has made this official. The upcoming Infinix Note 60 Ultra will be the phone in question, and it's going to be launching at some point next yearâ€¦

items.title: Antetokounmpo injured as Bucks beat Pistons
items.summary: The Milwaukee Bucks beat the Detroit Pistons 113-109 despite losing two-time NBA MVP Giannis Antetokounmpo to injury early in the match.

items.title: Weekly sports quiz: Which keeper did Haaland score his 100th goal against?
items.summary: How much attention have you paid to what's happened in the world of sport over the past seven days?

The South Korean giant will unveil its â€˜vision for DX division for 2026â€™ and â€˜AI-driven customer experiencesâ€™ during the event. The company will host â€˜The First Lookâ€™ event two days ahead of CES 2026 on January 4 in the Latourâ€¦

items.title: Crawley reaches fifty as England fight back on opening day of second Test
items.summary: Zak Crawley brings up his half-century to help England recover from 5-2 to 98-2 at lunch on day one of the second Ashes Test against Australia in Brisbane.

items.title: 'I feared failure' - why Savage left club that 'saved' him
items.summary: Four years on from film crews witnessing Macclesfield FC's rise from the ashes, a new documentary follows Robbie Savage as he takes over as manager at the club he helped to create.

items.title: Here's when the Motorola Edge 70 is rumored to reach India

It still hasn't made it to India, but according to a tipster over on X, that will change soon. [#InlinePriceWidget,14216,1#] The phone is allegedly due to launch in India arâ€¦

items.title: Four overs of chaos - second Test begins with more Ashes drama
items.summary: How England slumped to 5-2 - and could have been even worse off - in four overs of chaos at the hands of Mitchell Starc.

items.title: 'It's going horribly wrong' - Starc strikes twice as England start poorly
items.summary: England make a poor start to the second Test as Ben Duckett and Ollie Pope are both out for a duck as England fall to 5-2 on day one of the second Ashes Test against Australia in Brisbane.

items.summary: Poco made a big splash in late November, launching the F8 Pro and F8 Ultra in Bali, a mere eight months after their predecessors. This is an unusual launch timeline to say the least, but the brand felt like it couldn't wait any longer, and it wanted its new Ultra to be among the first devices on thâ€¦

items.title: Did we get too excited, too soon about Hearts?

items.title: Buying time or enough to save his job? Farke hails 'great' Leeds win
items.summary: In the relegation zone and under increasing pressure, Leeds' win over Chelsea was a "huge result" for Daniel Farke.

items.title: Match of the Day
items.summary: Highlights from nine Premier League matches across a busy midweek schedule.

items.title: iPhone 17e display details leak
items.summary: The iPhone 17e is expected to arrive in the first months of 2026, and a new report from Korea today shares some more details about its screen. Apparently, the panel will be made by BOE, Samsung Display, and LG Display, with BOE getting most of the orders. The screen will be identical to the LTPS OLâ€¦

items.title: How Farke stumbled on new system to get Leeds playing again
items.summary: Match of the Day pundits Danny Murphy and Shay Given look at Leeds boss Daniel Farke "stumbled" on a new system and how it worked in their favour in their 3-1 win over Chelsea.

items.title: Arsenal squad depth is 'remarkable' - analysis
items.summary: Match of the Day pundit Danny Murphy is impressed with the strength and depth of the Arsenal squad as the changes they made, particularly down the right side, paid off against Brentford.

items.title: How Watkins got back in the goals against Brighton

items.title: HBM undergoes major architectural shakeup as TSMC and GUC detail HBM4, HBM4E and C-HBM4E â€” 3nm base dies to enable 2.5x performance boost with speeds of up to 12.8GT/s by 2027
